title: Number Is Primitive
description: In this lab, we will explore the concept of primitive values in JavaScript. We will learn how to differentiate between primitive and non-primitive values using the isPrimitive() function, which compares the passed value with an object created from it. Through a series of exercises, we will gain a deeper understanding of this fundamental concept in JavaScript.

meta.title: Exploring Primitive Values in JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to differentiate between primitive and non-primitive values using the isPrimitive() function in this JavaScript tutorial.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, primitive values, javascript practice online, object, comparison, javascript lab, data types, javascript tutor

verify.name: Verify Node Commands In Zsh History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 数字是否为原始值
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索JavaScript中原始值的概念。我们将学习如何使用isPrimitive()函数区分原始值和非原始值，该函数会将传递的值与从它创建的对象进行比较。通过一系列练习，我们将对JavaScript中的这一基本概念有更深入的理解。

meta.title: 探索JavaScript中的原始值
meta.description: 在本JavaScript教程中，学习如何使用isPrimitive()函数区分原始值和非原始值。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, JavaScript练习, 原始值, 在线JavaScript练习, 对象, 比较, JavaScript实验, 数据类型, JavaScript教程

verify.name: 在Zsh历史记录中验证Node命令
